text: DYRD (1161 AM) is a radio station owned and operated by the Bohol Chronicle Radio Corporation. The station's studio is located at #56 Bernardino Inting St., Tagbilaran, and its transmitter facilities are located along Burgos St., Tagbilaran. Based on a survey conducted by Holy Name University Center for Research and Publications in 2016, it is ranked as the most listened to AM station.Bohol Radio Broadcast StationsDYRD: Top Bohol Station ==References== Category:News and talk radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations established in 2007 Category:Radio stations in Bohol
title: DYRD-AM
